Ship.Title: U.S.S. Enterprise-D
Ship.Text: Instead of making a normal attack with your primary weapon, you may fire in any direction at Range 1-2 with 3 attack dice.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Khazara
Ship.Text: If you initiate an attack while cloaked, add +1 attack die.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Maht-H'A
Ship.Text: Any ship attacking you at Range 1 rolls 1 less attack die.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Reliant
Ship.Text: You gain +1 attack die when firing at Range 1.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Enterprise
Ship.Text: The USS Enterprise can perform an Action listed on its Action Bar while it has an Auxiliary Power token.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Valdore
Ship.Text: If you perform a Green Maneuver, add +1 attack die for the remainder of this round.

Ship.Title: R.I.S. Apnex
Ship.Text: ACTION (once/game): Every ship at range 1 sustains 1 damage (including this ship). During the Planning Phase this ship must choose a '1' Maneuver (forward, bank or turn) for the rest of the game.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Gr'oth
Ship.Text: Each time you defend against a ship at Range 1, roll 1 extra defense die.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Negh'var
Ship.Text: ACTION: Target a ship within your firing arc at Range 1-2 and roll 3 attack dice. For each [HIT] result disable 1 of that ship's Shields. If possible, you may play Klingon Boarding Party as a free action this turn.

Ship.Title: Kraxon
Ship.Text: Whenever a friendly ship within Range 1 of your ship receives damage you may transfer any amount of that damage to your own Shields, if possible.

Ship.Title: Gor Portas
Ship.Text: Although you must be Target Locked on a ship to fire a Torpedo at it, you do not need to discard your Target Lock when doing so.

Ship.Title: Krayton
Ship.Text: ACTION: Disable 1 of your Active Shields to gain +1 attack die this round. You may re-roll all of your blank results once.

Ship.Title: Deep Space 9
Ship.Text: When firing any torpedoes, do not disable the torpedoes.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Ch'tang
Ship.Text: If you initiate an attack while cloaked, you may choose any number of your attack dice and re-roll them once.

Ship.Title: P.W.B. Aj'Rmr
Ship.Text: Each time you attack, you may re-roll 1 of your attack dice for every damage card assigned to your ship.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Defiant
Ship.Text: When defending, convert all of your opponent's [CRITICAL] results into [HIT] results.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Kronos One
Ship.Text: Any ship attacking you at Range 3 rolls 1 less attack die.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Praetus
Ship.Text: You may use the [CLOAK] Action even if you have no Active Shields. Whenever you choose the [CLOAK] Action, roll 1 attack die. On a [BATTLE STATIONS] result, your Hull sustains 1 Damage.

Ship.Title: 5th Wing Patrol Ship
Ship.Text: ACTION: When attacking this round, gain +1 attack die. When defending this round, roll one less defense die.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Koraga
Ship.Text: Each time you defend while Cloaked, roll +1 defense die

Ship.Title: Koranak
Ship.Text: Instead of making a normal attack, you may spend a [SCAN] Token to attack 2 different ships with your Primary Weapon at -2 attack dice each.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Excelsior
Ship.Text: After you move, if no enemy ships are within Range 1 of your ship, you may perform a [SCAN] action as a free action.

Ship.Title: R.I.S. Vo
Ship.Text: After you move, you may perform an [EVASIVE] action as a free action. If you do so, you cannot attack during this round.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Sutherland
Ship.Text: When you initiate an attack at range 3, you may choose any number of your attack dice and re-roll them once.

Ship.Title: Rav Laerst
Ship.Text: ACTION: Perform a [SENSOR ECHO] Action even if this ship is not Cloaked. You may only use the 1 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver Template for this Action.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Equinox
Ship.Text: ACTION: Disable 1 of your Active Shields. During the End Phase this round, repair all of your damaged Shields.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Somraw
Ship.Text: Each time you defend, you may convert up to 2 of your [BATTLE STATIONS] results into [EVASIVE] results.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Gal Gath`thong
Ship.Text: When initiating an attack while Cloaked, you may fire Plasma Torpedoes without needing a Target Lock.

Ship.Title: 4th Division Battleship
Ship.Text: Each round, one other friendly Jem'Hadar ship within Range 1-2 of your ship may perform an Action on their Action Bar as a free Action.

Ship.Title: Akorem
Ship.Text: Each time you defend, if there is an [EVASIVE] Token beside your ship, you may re-roll all of your defense dice once. You must keep the outcome of the 2nd roll.

Ship.Title: Federation Attack Fighter
Ship.Text: If you initiate an attack at Range 1, you may re-roll 1 of your attack dice. [Initial Captain skill 6]

Ship.Title: Hideki Class Attack Fighter
Ship.Text: Instead of making a normal attack, you may make an attack with 2 dice from your rear firing arc. [Initial Captain skill 6]

Ship.Title: Borg Sphere 4270
Ship.Text: Each time you attack with your Primary Weapon, you may divide your attack between 2 different ships. You may divide your attack dice however you like, but you must roll at least 1 die against each ship.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Voyager
Ship.Text: Instead of making a normal attack with your Primary Weapon, you may fire in any direction at Range 1-2 with 4 attack dice. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: Nistrim Raider
Ship.Text: When attacking an enemy ship with a Scan token next to it with your Primary Weapon, roll +2 attack dice.

Ship.Title: Bioship Alpha
Ship.Text: When you attack with your Primary Weapon, if you inflict at least 3 damage, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside the target ship.

Ship.Title: Tholia One
Ship.Text: You may perform the Action listed on the "Energy Web" Upgrade card as a free Action.

Ship.Title: D'Kyr
Ship.Text: Whenever you initiate an attack against an enemy ship at Range 3, gain +1 attack die.

Ship.Title: Interceptor 5
Ship.Text: You do not lose your "Perform Actions" step or take damage when you overlap a planet, obstacle or ship base. You may roll defense dice against any minefield.

Ship.Title: Tactical Cube 138
Ship.Text: The Borg Ablative Hull Armor [BORG] Upgrade costs -3 SP to equip to this ship.

Ship.Title: S'Gorn
Ship.Text: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, if you inflict at least 1 Critical Damage to the enemy ship's hull, that ship must also discard 1 [CREW] Upgrade (of its choice).

Ship.Title: I.K.S. B'Moth
Ship.Text: You can perform a Red Maneuver while there is an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: Gavroche
Ship.Text: ACTION: Disable up to 2 of your [CREW] Upgrades and add +1 attack die to each of your attacks this round for each [CREW] Upgrade you disabled with this Action.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Vorta Vor
Ship.Text: While you are Cloaked, after you perform a Green Maneuver, you may perform a [SENSOR ECHO] Action as a free Action.

Ship.Title: 3rd Wing Attack Ship
Ship.Text: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, during the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase you may disable one of your [CREW] Upgrades to add +1 attack die to your attack.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Yeager
Ship.Text: When attacking with Photon Torpedoes, you do not need to disable the Photon Torpedoes.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Enterprise
Ship.Text: ACTION: Disable up to 2 of your Active Shields. For each Shield you disabled with this Action, gain +1 attack die for all of your attacks with your Primary Weapon this round.

Ship.Title: Soong
Ship.Text: After performing a 5 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver, if there are no enemy ships in your forward firing arc, you may perform an [EVASIVE MANEUVERS] Action as a free Action.

Ship.Title: 2nd Division Cruiser
Ship.Text: Each time you defend, if you are within Range 1-2 of at least one friendly Jem'Hadar Attack Ship, roll 1 extra defense die.

Ship.Title: Ti'Mur
Ship.Text: Whenever you initiate an attack, you may disable one of your non-disabled [TECH] Upgrades to add +1 attack die.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Raven
Ship.Text: Each time you attack or defend, if there is a [SCAN] token beside your ship, your range combat bonuses are doubled.

Ship.Title: Enterprise NX-01
Ship.Text: You may equip the Enhanced Hull Plating [TECH] Upgrade to your ship for free even if it exceeds your ship's restrictions.

Ship.Title: Ni'Var
Ship.Text: Whenever you attack an enemy ship at Range 3 with your Primary Weapon, if there is a [SCAN] Token beside your ship, you gain +1 attack die for that attack.

Ship.Title: Scout 608
Ship.Text: After you move, you may discard one of your Upgrades to perform an additional Green or White Maneuver. You cannot deploy a [BORG] Upgrade with a cost greater than 5 to this ship.

Ship.Title: Borg Starship
Ship.Text: You cannot deploy a [BORG] Upgrade with a cost greater than 5 to this ship.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Stargazer
Ship.Text: During the Activation Phase, you may disable 1 of your Active Shields to remove 1 Auxiliary Power Token from beside your ship.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Enterprise-D
Ship.Text: During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may disable 1 of your Active Shields to gain +1 attack die.

Ship.Title: Assimilation Target Prime
Ship.Text: ACTION: Spend 1 Drone Token to repair 1 damage to your Hull or Shields.

Ship.Title: Bok's Marauder
Ship.Text: If you performed a Maneuver of 3 or higher this round, during the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may add +1 attack die. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: Prakesh
Ship.Text: After you move, if you are within Range 1 of a friendly ship, you may immediately perform one of the Actions listed on your Action Bar as a free Action.

Ship.Title: Relora-Sankur
Ship.Text: If you performed a Green Maneuver this round, during the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, roll +1 attack die.

Ship.Title: Borg Starship
Ship.Text: You cannot deploy a [BORG] Upgrade with a cost greater than 5 to this ship.

Ship.Title: Scout 255
Ship.Text: If there is a [SCAN] Token beside your ship during the Modify Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, roll +1 defense die. You cannot deploy a [BORG] Upgrade with a cost greater than 5 to this ship.

Ship.Title: Tal'Kir
Ship.Text: Each time you defend, during the Modify Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may add 1 [EVADE] result to your roll. If you do so, place 1 Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: Val Jean
Ship.Text: During the Modify Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may disable up to 3 of your Upgrades to add 1 [EVADE] result to your roll for each Upgrade you disabled with this card.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Avatar of Tomed
Ship.Text: When you perform a [CLOAK] Action, you may immediately perform a [REGENERATE] Action as a free Action. If you do so, you cannot attack that round.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Avatar of Tomed
Ship.Text: During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may roll +1 attack die. If you do so, suffer 1 damage to your Hull.

Ship.Title: Queen Vessel Prime
Ship.Text: During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, your ship, or 1 friendly ship within Range 1-2 of your ship, may spend a Scan Token from beside this ship to gain +1 attack die.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Enterprise-E
Ship.Text: You may fire a Torpedo at an enemy ship without needing a Target Lock. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.
